mapper.insert:
insert into a_activity(createId, title, imgUrls, desc, startTime, endTime, lastTime, maxPeople, visible, phone, price, type, targetUrl, address, activityType, examine, memberTemplate) value (#{createId}, #{title}, #{imgUrls}, #{desc}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{lastTime}, #{maxPeople}, #{visible}, #{phone}, #{price}, #{type}, #{targetUrl}, #{address}, #{activityType}, #{examine}, #{memberTemplate})
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
